mapper.insert: insert into tripactivity_review values(#{member_seq}, #{activity_review_content}, activity_review_seq.nextval, #{activity_review_score}, sysdate, #{activity_seq}, #{main_seq})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(activity_review_seq),0) as total_cnt_act_review, round(nvl(avg(activity_review_score),0),1) as total_avg_act_review from tripactivity_review
select tripmember.nickname, tripmember.profileimg from tripmember where member_seq = #{member_seq}
select nvl(count(activity_review_seq),0) as total_cnt_act_review from tripactivity_review

select tripactivity_review.activity_review_seq, tripmember.nickname, tripmember.profileimg, tripactivity_review.activity_review_score, to_char(tripactivity_review.activity_review_logtime, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as activity_review_logtime, tripactivity_review.activity_review_content from tripactivity_review, tripmember where tripactivity_review.member_seq = tripmember.member_seq order by tripactivity_review.activity_review_seq desc offset (#{pageNumg}-1) * 5 row fetch next 5 row only
